title: Elegant Gold Bangles Adorned with Diamonds (Kadiyalu)
materials: Round Brilliant Cut). Finished with a durable Hyderabad Polish.
features: These delicate bangles feature a minimalist design with evenly spaced diamond accents set in prong settings. The sleek lines and subtle sparkle create a modern yet timeless appeal. The bangles are lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold and Brilliant White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for a special someone. Also suitable for modern brides who appreciate subtle elegance.
description: Crafted with the finest 22K gold and sparkling diamonds, these bangles blend contemporary design with timeless elegance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster. A versatile piece that can be worn alone or stacked with other bangles for a personalized look. A symbol of enduring beauty and style.
